story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_0100: Are we really meeting her here?
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_0200:
Yeah. Professor Sonia is from the Galar region,
and she’s done research on the
Dynamax phenomenon.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_0300:
That’s why we’d like to ask her about what’s
going on, but...
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_0400:
we’re worried that Team Rocket might overhear
our conversations if we meet up with her in town.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_0500:
I see. So that’s why you chose such a secluded
area deep in the woods.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_0600:
Exactly. Will went to fetch the professor, so there
shouldn’t be any risk of her getting kidnapped
along the way, either.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_0700:
We also had Kris stay with Professor Bellis, so we
know she’ll be safe, too.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_0800:
We won’t make the same mistakes we did last
time. This time, we’re going to finish the job.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_1100:
We got lost a few times. It’s dark around here,
so everything looks the same!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_1200: Thanks for bringing her here, Will.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_1300:
Did you bring the thing I asked you
about, Professor?
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_1500:
This machine is something I’ve been working on
for a while now, but since you needed it, I
was able to complete it in record time!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_1600:
Ta-da! I call it the Dynamax Sync Pair Power
Spot Detector!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_1900:
It detects spots where Galar particles are
showing increased activity.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_2000:
Er...in other words, it’s able to find Pokémon that
are on the verge of Dynamaxing!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_2100:
Oh, really? So if we go the spot showing the
most activity...
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_2200:
There’s a good chance that’s where the Team
Rocket hideout is located?
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_2400:
That’s amazing, Professor Sonia. I can’t believe
you put this together in such a short amount
of time.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_2500:
Hehe! It may look a bit rough around the edges,
but I can assure you, it’s got pinpoint accuracy!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_2600: OK, let’s give it go, then. Where’s the on switch?
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_2700: You’ve made quite an annoying machine, I see.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_2900:
Our boss is busy running a grand experiment. We
can’t let you interfere with that.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_3000:
I am Proton, an executive of Team Rocket. I won’t
let you flip that switch!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_3100: Oh my gosh, Proton! You’re sooo cool!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_3200: I guess you were followed, Professor.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_3400: Well... I actually did notice that.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_3600:
But I felt it would be smarter if we dealt with it
once we got back together with the group. He
wasn’t showing any signs of attacking at the time.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_3700:
So this mighty Team Rocket executive just tailed
you instead of facing you head on in battle?
How spineless.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_3800:
Excuse me, what’d you just say?! You’ll be sorry
once Proton gets serious and takes you out in
a second!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_3900:
We’ll beat you to the ground and send you
home in tears!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_4000: Sorry, but we’re in a hurry.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_4100: I’ll have to ask you to leave!
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_4200: Hmph! Whatever, I still bought us some time.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_4300:
I don’t expect you to understand the grand mission
our boss is going to accomplish, anyway.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_4400:
Proton’s a Team Rocket executive...and he wasn’t
just all talk.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_4500:
Yeah. Team Rocket is definitely getting
stronger again.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_4600:
They’re a dangerous bunch. I’ll stay with Professor
Sonia for extra protection, just in case.
story_teamrocket_02_05000/2401_1201_4700:
OK. Then the rest of us should find their hideout
before it’s too late!
